name: Zombie Survival (iamrulloh)
description:
Zombie Survival is a survival game that represents Ghaa as a zombie who tried to survive the attack of the Shroka fighter who tried to destroy all the zombies that live on the planet Ghzkyk. Help Ghaa to avoid all the projectile and grab the brain to get something, good luck.

Genre:
Survival

Objective:
Avoid all projectile!

Features:
There are 3 possible things that you've got when you grab the brain

  • Shield - Gain your character a shield, become invisible for 5 sec!,
  • Fast Forward - Make the projectile move faster and faster, prepare yourself!
  • Get Back - Make the projectile to its initial state, don't panic! 

Remember that Ghaa only has 1 lives!

Controls:

  • Arrow Left - Move character to the left
  • Arrow Right - Move character to the right

Gitlab:
https://gitlab.com/iamrulloh/game-jam

Assets:
Background
Projectile
Character
Buttons
CC Wild Words Roman Font
Pixel Emulator Font
SF Digital Readout Font
